lead_paragraph: Bartolo Colon allowed one run over three innings in his exhibition season debut, Lucas Duda and Neil Walker homered and a New York Mets split squad beat the Detroit Tigers 7-3 Monday.

headline.print_headline: Bartolo Colon Helps Mets' Split Squad Top Tigers 7-3
headline.main: Bartolo Colon Helps Mets' Split Squad Top Tigers 7-3

snippet: Bartolo Colon allowed one run over three innings in his exhibition season debut, Lucas Duda and Neil Walker homered and a New York Mets split squad beat the Detroit Tigers 7-3 Monday....
